overview: the story of Hope Fay, an 18-year-old high-school senior, going through one of life's most agitating and emotional times. With the battle of convincing her traditional, conservative parents to accept her transition to womanhood and the loss of their son, life becomes even more complicated. She meets many adversaries, new and old alike, on her journey for inner peace. With her few friends left in this world, she fights to find both respect and belonging
title: Her Name Was Hope
